alert.note: Alert for Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mainland Monroe County through 315 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Loop Road Ee Center, or 21 miles east of Chokoloskee, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loop Road Ee Center and Everglades National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
